alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 8:24PM CDT until April 16 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Two Rivers River near Hallock affecting Kittson County. .River levels continue to rise and a crest approaches after the 12th of April. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY, APRIL 16... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Two Rivers River near Hallock. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Saturday, April 16. * IMPACTS...At 802.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. Hallock Dam spillway at Gilbert Park closed to the public. Culverts with flappers are checked. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 800.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 801.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall to 801.6 feet and begin rising again tomorrow evening. It will rise above flood stage late Sunday morning and continue to rise to 802.8 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 802.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
